::Killfest::

Killfest narrows his eyes, looking down at the bot in front of 
him. "Very well, if you do not wish to be on the winning side, you 
may leave."

It would be better to let him leave than forcing him to stay or 
killing him. Disobedient troops were never useful, and killing this 
bot might not make Killfest too popular.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Starscream:::
> 
> ::he couldnt beleive what he was hearing::
> Starscream: I cant beleive this!  Shes dead, and all you bastards 
can 
> think about is who gets to be leader next!  And i refuse to follow 
> you, Megatron.
> ::He turns to Killfest::
> Starscream: i'm sorry, but irefuse to be led by someone i havent 
even 
> met.  Without Kitkat, i dont have any motivation.  I am leaving, to 
> pursue my own fate.  Drillbit, I suggest you join me.  We could 
start 
> up our own group.  This group will be founded in memory of 
Kitkat,for 
> without her, we probably would both be dead by now.  What do you 
say?
> ::By now he didnt care if his true feelings for Kitkat showed or 
not::
> 
> OOC: Remember, Minime has said that Starscream has changed since 
the 
> great war, and is a lot more humane.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Killfest/Greven/Scyther/EndBringer/Demise::
> > 
> > Killfest looks up, hearing the scream. He walks out of his room.
> > 
> > "Everyone, follow me," he says into his internal communication 
> system 
> > with his team. Doors opened, his team walking out. At the council 
> > door, Scyther turns around, cloaked as he makes his way toward 
> > Killfest.
> > 
> > Several moments later, Killfest enters the CR room, just in time 
to 
> > hear the exchange between Megatron and Drillbit.EndBringer, 
Greven, 
> > and Demise walk in behind him. All four dwarfed the other 
Predacons 
> > in the room. Killfest narrows his eyes as he looks at KitKat.
> > 
> > "I just spoke to her," he says, "I am to take command of the 
> Predacon 
> > forces, by her orders."
> > 
> > The three bots stood behind him, ready to tear anyone who 
disagreed 
> > to pieces.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Cloaked, Scyther silently enters the CR room, looking at 
Killfest, 
> > knowing that no one could see or detect him.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> > >        Megatron entered the room to see Kitkat die, and then 
> > Drillbit whine 
> > > over it. That was not the Predacon way...
> > >        "I shall now assume complete control over the predacon 
> > forces within 
> > > this base, as the next highest ranking officer it is my duty 
and 
> > privilage. 
> > > Waspinator, move the body into a burial pod. We will leave 
cargo 
> > bay 5 open 
> > > for the mourners. Now, Hell Beast and i shall go to the bridge 
to 
> > make some 
> > > needed changes."
